オプション1: Just a small amount of water wasn’t enough, so Star Man drank all the rainwater around him. Even after that, he was still thirsty.
(Maybe it was just the sunlight reflecting off the waves...)

オプション1: After sitting down to rest, he was immediately struck with stomach pain and had diarrhea. Still, his thirst was less than before drinking the rainwater.
(My head hurts too... but I think I can move a little.)
The opposite side of the beach was forest. The forest was untouched by people, but there were gaps wide enough to walk through.
(Maybe I should try heading that way.)
